section.p: The knight reins in, waving his men to a halt. Raising his visor, he takes a close look at you, then shuffles through some wanted posters that the sergeant of militia hands to him. Then he gives a judicious nod, and before you can act the militia have seized you.
‘Did you think that you’d got away with your crime?’ grates the knight. ‘The Baroness’s justice has a long reach!’
You are divested of all your possessions and cash (cross them off) and hauled off in chains to Castle Ravayne, where they fling you into the dungeons. .
